descriptionHtml:
This is my first attempt at a mod, styled after urshi\'s [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/17163] Hot Male Housecarls[/url] mod which doesn\'t change Rayya.  After I asked urshi about it, I thought, \"Hey, why don\'t I get off my butt and try doing it myself?\"  So here we are, a new entry in the \"My First Mod\" category.  It seems to be working for me, so hopefully it works for all of you. :)

This mod obviously requires Hearthfire since Rayya is only available in that expansion.
author: Quahoac
